Package hydra.ext.org.apache.parquet.format

Class Encoding

  • java.lang.Object
    • hydra.ext.org.apache.parquet.format.Encoding
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Encoding.BitPacked, Encoding.ByteStreamSplit, Encoding.DeltaBinaryPacked, Encoding.DeltaByteArray, Encoding.DeltaLengthByteArray, Encoding.Plain, Encoding.Rle, Encoding.RleDictionary
    public abstract class Encoding
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Encodings supported by Parquet. Not all encodings are valid for all types. These enums are also used to specify the encoding of definition and repetition levels. See the accompanying doc for the details of the more complicated encodings.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      static class  Encoding.BitPacked

      Delta encoding for integers.
      static class  Encoding.DeltaByteArray
      Incremental-encoded byte array.
      static class  Encoding.DeltaLengthByteArray
      Encoding for byte arrays to separate the length values and the data.
      static interface  Encoding.PartialVisitor<R>  
      static class  Encoding.Plain
      Default encoding.
      static class  Encoding.Rle
      Group packed run length encoding.
      static class  Encoding.RleDictionary
      Dictionary encoding: the ids are encoded using the RLE encoding
      static interface  Encoding.Visitor<R>
